name: Creekers Woodworks BIGGEST BOY End Grain Cutting Board, Butcher Block
description:
For sale is a beautiful, one of a kind end grain cutting board. This cutting board features a checkerboard pattern of Maple and Cherry. The end grain construction allows for a more forgiving cutting surface that is virtually indestructible. An obsessive attention to detail is given to every cutting board to ensure your cutting board last a lifetime.
**If the board you request is not in stock, there will be a build time of 5-7 days.**

The measurements are approximately-
Length- 17 1/2 inches
Width- 12 inches
Thickness- 3 inches

The board is finished with Mineral oil.
I can also personalize your board with a inlaid letter of your choice for an additional $30.

name: Creekers Woodworks Solid Maple Butcher Block Cutting Board
description:
For sale is a beautiful, one of a kind Maple Butcher Block. This cutting board features a multitude of angles. The ends are angled at 45 degrees, and the edges are routed at a 45 degree chamfer. The board has no feet, so it can be used on either side. The grain in this board really makes it a beautiful piece.

If the board you request is not in stock, there will be a build time of 5-7 days.

The measurements are approximately-

Length- 19 1/4 inches
Width- 11 1/4 inches
Thickness- 1 1/2 inches

The board is finished with Mineral oil.
I can also personalize your board with a Walnut inlaid letter of your choice for an additional $30. Let me know before purchasing, and I will add to the invoice.

name: Creekers Woodworks Maple Cherry and Walnut cutting board Cheese Bread
description:
This cutting board might just be the perfect size for all your light duty cutting, including breads and cheeses. It is handcrafted with Walnut, Cherry and Maple strips. It's most notable feature is the unique finger groove handle. A hole is cut in the handle, which can serve as a means to hang the board, and makes it easy to pick up off the counter-top.
This board measures
18" long
8 3/4" wide
3/4" thick
The whole board is finished in Mineral Oil.

name: Creekers Woodworks BIG BOY End Grain Cutting Board, Butcher Block
description:
For sale is a beautiful, one of a kind end grain cutting board. This cutting board features a unique offset pattern of Maple and Cherry. The end grain construction allows for a more forgiving cutting surface that is virtually indestructible.
If the board you request is not in stock, there will be a build time of 5-7 days.

name: Creekers Woodworks The Bow-tie End Grain small blocks Cutting Board Butcher Block
description:
For sale is a beautiful, one of a kind end grain cutting board. This End Grain board features interlocking blocks of Walnut, Hard Maple, and Cherry. The grains in this board are nothing short of amazing! The ends gracefully sweep in to give the board the bow-tie look. The end grain construction allows for a more forgiving cutting surface that is virtually indestructible. An obsessive attention to detail is given to every cutting board to ensure your cutting board last a lifetime. 

If the board you request is not in stock, there will be a build time of 5-7 days.

The measurements are approximately-
13 1/4" x 10 1/2" x 1 1/2"


The board is finished with Mineral oil.
I can also personalize your board with a inlaid letter of your choice for an additional $30. Let me know before purchasing, and I will add to the invoice.
